sources.title: "True Heart Susie" (1919) director D. W. Griffith starring Lillian Gish and Robert Harron

metadata.Plot: Susie, a plain young country girl, secretly loves a neighbor boy, William. She believes in him and sacrifices much of her own happiness to promote his own ambitions, all without his knowledge. Eventually he rises to a position of success and sophistication, and Susie realizes that she has through her own efforts raised him to a level where he is inaccessible to her.
